label: [TBAAL - interview with Curtis King]
description: Audio from The Black Academy of Arts and Letters. The audio is of Sharon Parker recording an interview she conducted with TBAAL founder and president Curtis King regarding the Martin Luther King Ceremony set to take place in 2010. King talks about his background and the story behind the founding of TBAAL.
